#summary Meal Planner Activity.
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

The Meal Planner activity list meals you have planned to make.


= Details =

The meal planner activity lists the meals you have planned to make using the [MealPlannerEdit meal planner edit] activity. Each row of the list shows a meal and how many people you have planned to make it for.

A [ShoppingList shopping list] is automatically generated based on the ingredients that will be used to make each meal and what is currently in the cupboard.
